name: Assembly Line
overview: If your crew at the Mercedes plant keeps on schedule you win a vacation in Cairo. So fare this year you're in first place. Can you keep it up? It's not easy, but you're the best! Dash to the parts bin, snatch a part and run back to the assembly line. Place the part in the wheel on the conveyor belt, then do it again. Only 5 tiers can pass by untouched or you lose...the game, and a fantasy journey to Egypt.
